name: Lotsov Bullets (Friend Jam IV)
description:
What is this game?

A short and intense bullet hell with a blue circle that shoot blue circular bullets to a purple triangle that shoot purple trianglular bullets back. Thatza lotsov bullets!

You, the Blob, have one objective: Beat the bad guy to save as many Globinou as possible!

Between every battles, you can buy upgrades with Globinous, but be aware, the ennemy will adapt to your choices! You can get different endings depending on your upgrades, or if you picked any at all.

Buy for free!! (might have a lot of bugs!) Things to know.

This game was made in a single week and stille is a prototype! It was for the Friend Jam IV, a jam with some friends. The theme was "One Ennemy", so I made this.

I may release a more complete version of the game one day, but I'd rather not promise anything.

Before you play, please read the "READ ME BEFORE PLAYING, LIKE, FOR REAL!.txt" file! There are some issue with the game, since it was made in a week, so everything you need to know is there.

(Also I may have misspell a few things since english isn't my first language, sorry about that)
